faq_subtitle: Everything you need to know about our Bible study platform.

items.question: What is Scriptura?
items.answer: Scriptura is an online Bible study platform designed to help users study the Bible. Scriptura offers interactive study tools, structured reading plans, inductive study methods and multiple Bible translations to help you better understand God's Word.

items.question: Is Scriptura suitable for beginners?
items.answer: Absolutely. Scriptura is designed for all ages and provides an intuitive experience for beginners. At the same time, it offers enough depth for advanced users. From simple reading plans to deep theological insights. We have something for everyone.

items.question: Can I use Scriptura as a source of information?
items.answer: Scriptura is not a replacement for the Bible, nor is it an information source. It is a tool with which you can study and understand the Bible. It is a platform that should be used as a supplement to just reading the Bible.

items.question: What Bible translations are available on Scriptura?
items.answer: Currently, Scriptura provides access to several popular Bible translations, including the Statenvertaling, Herziene Statenvertaling, Afrikaans, American Standard Version and the King James Version. We aim to add more translations in the future, depending on the version.

items.question: What are the system requirements for using Scriptura?
items.answer: Scriptura is a web-based platform and can be used on any device with a modern web browser. For the best experience, we recommend a recent version of Chrome, Firefox, Safari or Edge. Make sure you have a stable internet connection.
